name: Flixel Photos Inc
description: Developer of creative tools designed for photographers, videographers, and marketers to create living photos, cinematography, and more. The company offers creation tools and a web-sharing platform, enabling professional photographers and users to tell stories using a new visual medium, save time, and complement workflows.
